caption: Classification algorithms and their parameterization. For kNN, $p = 2$ stands for Euclidean distance. RBF: radial basis function. Remaining parameters are defined in the supplementary material. \pkg{R} package is the library implementing the method.

Classification algorithms and their parameterization. For RMLR, $\alpha = 1$ stands for lasso regularization. RBF: radial basis function. For kNN, $p = 2$ stands for Euclidean distance. Remaining parameters are defined in the supplementary material. \pkg{R} package is the package implementing the method.
